message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal, and I believe you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $850,000 for it at this time. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
Bob, I understand your offer, but $850,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still cannot justify spending more than $850,000 on this product. I would like to stick to that figure. Thank you for considering my position.
